product_name: MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light Bike Wheel Light
long_description: The MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light bike wheel light attaches to your spokes and displays simple, colorful graphics on your spinning bike wheel to light up the night with a highly visible display.
short_description: The MonkeyLectric M210 Monkey Light bike wheel light attaches to your spokes and displays simple, colorful graphics on your spinning bike wheel to light up the night with a highly visible display.
